description: Matching History Transaction Related Items.  A line is added to this related group whenever two transactions are matched together.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date that a transaction was matched to this transaction.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_ID
columns.description: This item stores the transaction that this transaction was matched to.  If the MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DT is null, then the transaction is still currently matched to this transaction.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the (insurance+self-pay) amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_INS_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the insurance amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_PAT_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the self-pay amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_COMMENT
columns.description: This item holds the comment for the matching of this transaction to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.  This item is typically only populated by the system and not user entered comments.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DT
columns.description: This item holds the date that the transaction was unmatched from the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_D_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the coverage ID at the time that the transaction was matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_DSUSR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the users who matched this transaction to the transaction from column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_UDUSR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user that unmatched this transaction from the transaction in the MTCH_TX_HX_ID column.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_INV_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the invoice associated with the debit transaction in the matching group.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_UN_COM
columns.description: This item stores the comment entered when the transaction is undistributed.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_UN_CV_ID
columns.description: This is the coverage of the debit transaction at the time of unmatch.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_LINE
columns.description: This item stores the corresponding line from the matched transaction.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time the transaction was matched.

columns.name: MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time the transaction was unmatched.
